channel.title: Android on Marcus Schiesser
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Marcus Schiesser

item.title: Using Google App Engine as Backend for Android
item.description: If you’re looking for a way to create a backend for your Android application, Google App Engine looks like the perfect choice: You can use Java as you can do for Android and you don’t need to think too much about hosting, as it is all stored in the cloud. Another benefit is that you can reuse your transfer objects on the client and on server side. But as it is often there are some problems doing this in practice.
